titles.title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to exclude certain basic allowances for housing of an individual who is a member of the uniformed services from the determination of eligibility for free and reduced price meals of a child of the individual.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 10/10/2001--Introduced. Amends the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to exclude certain basic allowances for housing of a member of the uniformed services from the determination of eligibility of such member's child for free and reduced price meals under such Act.
